```{r}
submission_file <- read_csv("data/sample_submission.csv")
submission_file %>% 
  mutate(date = substr(id, start = 22, stop = 31)) %>% 
  mutate(id = substr(id, start = 0, stop = 20)) %>% 
  group_by(id) %>% 
  summarise(total =  n())
```
